Detailed Description

Base class for all objects in x2d

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Parameters:
[in] k The kernel

Member Function Documentation

void x2d::base_object::connect_render (  )  [inline, protected]

Used to connect the render function to the kernel. Should be invoked in the constructor of a child class.

void x2d::base_object::connect_touch_input ( space  s  )  [inline, protected]

Used to connect the touch_input function to the kernel. Should be invoked in the constructor of a child class. Can be invoked multiple times, once for each space.

void x2d::base_object::connect_update (  )  [inline, protected]

Used to connect the update function to the kernel. Should be invoked in the constructor of a child class.

virtual void x2d::base_object::render ( const clock_info &  clock  )  [inline, protected, virtual]

Base render function. Override this if you need rendering. Don't forget to connect.

See also:
connect_render.

Reimplemented in x2d::object.

virtual void x2d::base_object::touch_input_began ( space  s,
const std::vector< touch > &  touches 
) [inline, protected, virtual]

Touch input began receiver. One can connect multiple receivers for different spaces. Don't forget to connect.

See also:

) [inline, protected, virtual]
